entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as one of the people appealing for support. He shakes his head in response to a question about the voice.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is also mentioned as one of the people appealing for support and agrees with Harry that it was a human voice.

entities.name: winky
entities.description: Winky is mentioned as an elf who is being questioned by Mr. Diggory about the last spell her wand performed.

entities.name: mr diggory
entities.description: Mr. Diggory is mentioned as a person who knows how to discover the last spell a wand performed and is questioning Winky about it.

entities.name: dumbledore's army member (implied)
entities.description: Although not explicitly stated, Mr. Diggory seems to be associated with Dumbledore's Army as he knows how to discover the last spell a wand performed.

relationships.description: Mr. Diggory is questioning Winky about the last spell her wand performed.
Although not explicitly stated, Mr. Diggory seems to be associated with Dumbledore's Army as he knows how to discover the last spell a wand performed.
Mr. Diggory is related to Harry in some way, possibly as his teacher or mentor.
